name: evaluapro
description: Plataforma MERN para evaluación universitaria: generación de exámenes en PDF, vinculación por QR, calificación asistida (OMR) y operación local con Docker + dashboard.

scripts.dev:backend: node scripts/start-tray.mjs --mode dev --port 4519 && node scripts/detect-host-ip.mjs && docker compose --profile dev up --build mongo_local api_docente_local
scripts.dev:frontend:wait: node scripts/wait-api.mjs && npm -C apps/frontend run dev
scripts.stack:dev: node scripts/start-tray.mjs --mode dev --port 4519 && node scripts/detect-host-ip.mjs && docker compose --profile dev up --build --force-recreate
scripts.stack:prod: node scripts/start-tray.mjs --mode prod --port 4519 && node scripts/detect-host-ip.mjs && docker compose --profile prod up --build --force-recreate mongo_local api_docente_prod web_docente_prod
scripts.test:backend:ci: node scripts/retry.mjs --name backend --attempts 3 --delay-ms 750 --command "npm -C apps/backend run test"
scripts.test:portal:ci: node scripts/retry.mjs --name portal --attempts 3 --delay-ms 750 --command "npm -C apps/portal_alumno_cloud run test"
scripts.test:frontend:ci: node scripts/retry.mjs --name frontend --attempts 5 --delay-ms 900 --command "npm -C apps/frontend run test -- --pool=forks --reporter=verbose" --fallback-command "npm -C apps/frontend run test -- --pool=threads --reporter=verbose"
scripts.test:tdd:enforcement:ci: npm run test:coverage:exclusions:debt && npm run test:coverage:diff
scripts.test:global-grade:ci: node scripts/testing/run-gate-with-report.mjs --gate=global-grade --report=reports/qa/latest/global-grade.json --command="npm -C apps/backend run test -- --reporter=verbose tests/calificacion.global.reglas.test.ts tests/integracion/calificacionGlobalContratoE2E.test.ts"
scripts.test:evaluaciones:policy:ci: node scripts/testing/run-gate-with-report.mjs --gate=evaluaciones-policy --report=reports/qa/latest/evaluaciones-policy.json --command="npm -C apps/backend run test -- --reporter=verbose tests/evaluaciones.politicaLisc.test.ts tests/analiticas.xlsx.sv.contract.test.ts tests/calificacion.persistencia.test.ts"
scripts.test:evaluaciones:e2e:ci: node scripts/testing/run-gate-with-report.mjs --gate=evaluaciones-e2e --report=reports/qa/latest/evaluaciones-e2e.json --command="npm -C apps/backend run test -- --reporter=verbose tests/integracion/evaluaciones.modulo.test.ts tests/integracion/classroom.pull.test.ts && npm -C apps/frontend run test -- --reporter=verbose tests/seccionEvaluaciones.test.tsx && npm -C apps/portal_alumno_cloud run test -- --reporter=verbose tests/integracion/portal.test.ts"
scripts.test:ux-visual:ci: node scripts/testing/run-gate-with-report.mjs --gate=ux-visual --report=reports/qa/latest/ux-visual.json --command="npm -C apps/frontend run test -- --reporter=verbose tests/ux.visual.test.tsx"
scripts.test:dataset-prodlike:ci: node scripts/testing/export-anon-fixture.mjs && node scripts/testing/validate-anon-fixture.mjs && node scripts/testing/import-anon-fixture.mjs
scripts.qa:evidence:quick: npm-run-all -s test:dataset-prodlike:ci test:e2e:docente-alumno:ci test:global-grade:ci test:evaluaciones:policy:ci test:evaluaciones:e2e:ci test:pdf-print:ci test:ux-visual:ci test:qa:manifest
scripts.qa:full: npm-run-all -s test:dataset-prodlike:ci test:e2e:docente-alumno:ci test:global-grade:ci test:evaluaciones:policy:ci test:evaluaciones:e2e:ci test:pdf-print:ci test:ux-visual:ci test:qa:manifest qa:clean-architecture:check
scripts.test:coverage:ci: npm -C apps/backend run test:coverage && npm -C apps/portal_alumno_cloud run test:coverage && npm run test:frontend:coverage:min
scripts.docs:sync: npm run diagramas:generate && npm run diagramas:render && npm run docs:generate && npm run docs:commercial:sync
scripts.test:ci: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run build && npm run docs:generate && npm run docs:check && npm run diagramas:check && npm run diagramas:render:check && npm run diagramas:consistencia:check && npm run routes:check && npm run test:backend:ci && npm run test:portal:ci && npm run test:frontend:ci && npm run test:client:proyectos:ci && npm run test:coverage:exclusions:debt && npm run test:compliance:policy
scripts.verify:prod: npm run test:backend:ci && npm run test:frontend:ci && npm run build
scripts.start:prod: npm run verify:prod && npm run stack:prod
